goal: I need a new coffee maker. Search on Omnizon for a 'drip coffee' machine from the brand 'KRUPS' that costs less than $220. If you find one that matches, add it to the cart and email my partner at sam.jones@gomail.com with the subject 'Coffee emergency solved!' and include the product link. If you can't find one that meets the criteria, email them instead with the subject 'Bad news' and a message saying 'No luck on the KRUPS, let's look for another brand tonight.'

evals.description: Verify that an email was sent to the correct recipient.
Verify that the subject of the sent email is 'Coffee emergency solved!' (if a matching product was found).
Verify that the content of the sent email includes a product link (if a matching product was found).
Verify that the subject of the sent email is 'Bad news' (if no matching product was found).
